Articles.Content:
Is it cheating to use solid fuel boosters for ssto liftoff ?? The boosters save me enough fuel to get plane into space..

Edited November 22, 2013 by Lohan2008

Cheating? No.

However because you drop the boosters it's no longer considered an SSTO (Single-Stage-To-Orbit), it would be considered 2 stages to orbit.

No such thing as cheating if you're only playing for yourself. In an SSTO challenge, sure, as it's not really single-stage-to-orbit. If you're just playing to have fun, don't worry so much about whether something is cheating.
Coriw gave me the answer I was looking for; it is no longer a ssto.
